August 2010 to March 2012 Description Facial Recognition Software offers two kinds of matching services to users This whole application accepts facial images as input in JPG format and submits them to the core matching services through sockets in parallel to enable distributed computing This application matches the input with the whole database and the second one compares two facial images using Eigen face algorithm to calculate the distance between the facial features This application also retrieves all matching results at later point in future and updates verified results in the database
